Reviews.Title: What a great deal!
Reviews.Author: Price
Reviews.Content: I got this deal over black Friday weekend so we got this package for $150. What a great deal!It does come with a 16 gig memory card (it says 8gb in the description so we weren't sure).The camera is fantastic. We haven't used it a lot, but have been very pleased with its quality.Very happy with this purchase and with the seller!

Reviews.Title: NO POWER!
Reviews.Author: C. Ferris
Reviews.Content: I just got the camera and flew to Alaska anxious to take many beautiful pictures.  The first set of batteries I used that came with the camera died after 2 pictures.  I put in the replacement batteries that came with the bundle I purchased.  Took a few more photos and those died.  Put in the last two batteries that came with the camera and after just a few pictures - battery exhausted!  Does this camera eat batteries or is the batteries included really that cheap?Thus many shots were not taken because I was miles from where I could buy new batteries.

Reviews.Title: plan on going through a ton of batteries
Reviews.Author: karen
Reviews.Content: goes through all batteries in a flash, even the recharables. Flash doesn't always work when i want it to. great zoom capabilities, of course you have to back off the maximum zoom a pinch for a clear picture.

Reviews.Title: just what was needed
Reviews.Author: John Wagner
Reviews.Content: Bought for my special needs daughter.  she loves it, easy to use and has the look and accessories she wanted.

Reviews.Title: OK Camera
Reviews.Author: ljc311
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to take many shots.  I have a new grand daughter and of course, when you snap a picture they smile just after it.  This camera does take many shots, but the more you take in one session the lower the quality of the picture.  It also takes many seconds to record the image and you might miss something if you want multiple shots.  The pictures it does take - single shots -  are good and print in good quality

Reviews.Title: Recommend it!
Reviews.Author: Diana J Schelb
Reviews.Content: I love the size, clarity of the photos and the wide angle lens. It's great for taking pictures of small rooms.

Reviews.Title: Loved it!
Reviews.Author: marissa30
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this camera! I had a really annoying earlier version of Nikon Coolpix, and when my hubby bought this one, I was skeptical, but I am more than satisfied.  Batteries don't keep falling out like my other camera, no blurry pics, and awesome close ups.  Very happy, and incredible value!

Reviews.Title: POOR BATTERY LIFE
Reviews.Author: Vicky Vaughan
Reviews.Content: THE BATTERY LIFE IS MINIMAL.  BATTERIES LAST LESS THAN HALF A DAY AFTER TAKING OFF THE CHARGER!!!!!!  I STILL LIKE IT THOUGH

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: Dianna Greiner
Reviews.Content: This whole package was great.  Better than buying everything separately.  I have been taking pictures but haven't developed them yet.

Reviews.Title: small, easy to use, adequate for the job.
Reviews.Author: administrator
Reviews.Content: This camera is small, lightweight, and does the job intended very well.  I would recommend it.  I do, however, recommend rechargeable batteries since this little unit is somewhat of a power hog.  Regular batteries don't last a long time.  Rechargeable will definitely pay off fairly quickly.

Reviews.Title: Not a typical Nikon
Reviews.Author: texaschick
Reviews.Content: I've had more than one Nikon and, until now, found the picture quality very good.  This camera takes fair outdoor shots but indoor photos have not been as good a quality as I would like.  The flash has a very limited range and many indoor shots come out either yellow or, if I don't use the flash, a bit blurry.  I'm still experimenting with settings and hope to get some good shots soon.  However, so far, only the outdoor pictures have turned out OK.

Reviews.Title: battery charger issue
Reviews.Author: gary bell
Reviews.Content: the camera is wonderful, the only thing not liked is the battery charger,when you plug it in to charge the batteries,no matter how long it's charging you have no way of knowing when the batteries are totally charged. a bit cheeesy to say the least.

Reviews.Title: Unfortunately Not a great camera
Reviews.Author: Gina M. Borea
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a point and shoot that is easy to use and takes great pictures. The Nikon L610 came highly recommended so I was hoping that the Nikon COLPIX L610 would be the camera for me. Unfortunately it wasn’t. The quality of the camera itself wasn’t good. The shutter speed was terrible and the pictures didn’t come out great. I will keep on searching.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Barb
Reviews.Content: The Christmas gift was well received and they were pleased to receive it.  It will be used alot this coming year.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: susan schall
Reviews.Content: It has a great zoom but the battery life is poor. maybe 50 shoots and you need a new battery. also if you use the video part it doesnt take long and you need to change the battery. also when the person is moving in the picture, it comes out blurry. I sent it back...

Reviews.Title: I love the Coolpix L610
Reviews.Author: hongyan
Reviews.Content: good seller, good quilty.with HP 1080, and i love the SD card 16GB, the NI-MH battery is perfect. my sister loves it more.
